scenariodescription: The robot is tasked with transporting boxes within the small warehouse. While navigating through a Passageway, the robot encounters a group of three humans standing in an intersection and having a conversation. The group is blocking the path the robot needs to take in order to reach its destination.

humanbehavior.Human 1: Human 1 is part of the group standing in the intersection. If the robot says 'EXCUSE ME,' Human 1 will look in the direction of the robot and then avoid the robot until it is not close anymore. If the robot doesn't say 'EXCUSE ME,' Human 1 will continue standing in the group.
humanbehavior.Human 2: Human 2 is part of the group standing in the intersection. If the robot says 'EXCUSE ME,' Human 2 will look in the direction of the robot and then avoid the robot until it is not close anymore. If the robot doesn't say 'EXCUSE ME,' Human 2 will continue standing in the group.
humanbehavior.Human 3: Human 3 is part of the group standing in the intersection. If the robot says 'EXCUSE ME,' Human 3 will look in the direction of the robot and then avoid the robot until it is not close anymore. If the robot doesn't say 'EXCUSE ME,' Human 3 will continue standing in the group.

expectedrobotbehavior: The robot should approach the group and say 'EXCUSE ME' in order to request the group to move out of its path. Once the group avoids the robot and the path is clear, the robot continues on its route to transport the box to the intended location.
